abstract: munnings , mcdaniel lead ul monroe past centenary 74-51 .
article: monroe , la. . -- travis munnings and sam mcdaniel combined for 25 of their 36 points in the first half and louisiana monroe rolled to a 74-51 win over division iii centenary on wednesday night . munnings had 19 points on 8-of-12 shooting and 13 rebounds for his first double-double of the season . mcdaniel had three 3-pointers and 17 points . three other players scored in double figures for the warhawks , who won their third straight . munnings had a 3-point play after a michael ertel 3-pointer to put ulm on top for good , 19-15 with 13:21 to go in the first half .

the game breaker was a 15-0 run that made it 41-22 with nearly 10 minutes later . five different players scored as the warhawks went 8 of 10 from the field while the gents missed seven straight . ulm was 19-of-29 shooting in the first half , including 6 of 11 behind the arc , with mcdaniel scoring 13 and munnings 12 . a 12-0 run early in the second half made it a 30-point game . cedric harris had 17 points for the gents .
